# Stefan Dukic Portfolio - AI Documentation

# Last updated: 2025-01-27

## About Stefan Dukic
Full-stack developer and AI enthusiast currently pursuing Mastery in Software Engineering at 42 Lausanne. Level 13.88 student with exceptional academic performance and professional experience at major technology companies.

## Professional Experience

### Audi AG - Software Engineer (Nov 2023 - Apr 2024)
- Designed REST APIs using RAML and developed complete backend services for financial systems integration
- Managed CI/CD pipelines and documented APIs on Confluence, improving team adoption and maintenance efficiency
- Streamlined research and analytics workflows by optimizing business logic and creating data visualizations
- Leveraged test-driven development to deliver robust, scalable software in conjunction with Agile teams

### Veri School - Software Engineer (Feb 2022 - Oct 2022)
- Developed a decentralized IT education platform focused on blockchain-based solutions
- Built decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) using OpenZeppelin and Aragon frameworks
- Created a DApp prototype using Moralis to showcase the platform's core functionality
- Optimized platform for security and ease of use while maintaining high performance standards

## Education

### 42 Lausanne - Mastery in Software Engineering (May 2024 - Present)
- Specializing in Full Stack Development
- Proficient in utilizing various technologies including React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL
- Focus on advanced frontend and backend development techniques

### 42 Heilbronn - Core Curriculum in Software Engineering (Oct 2022 - May 2024)
- Recognized as one of the quickest learners of the year
- Mastered C, C++, JavaScript, Bash, Networks, Algorithms, and Virtualizations
- Built strong foundation in computer science fundamentals
- Collaborated with peers to build multiple projects

### Kantonsschule Romanshorn - Secondary Education (Aug 2018 - Aug 2022)
- Top student in physics with strong analytical skills
- Participated in Talenta IT: Python, neural networks, and Arduino
- Built a CPU from scratch using transistors
- Developed projects using Unreal Engine

## Notable Projects

### Matcha - Dating Platform
- Full-featured dating platform with real-time matching and communication
- Technologies: Express, React, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, WebSocket, OAuth2
- Features: User profiles, GPS-based location matching, real-time chat, notifications
- GitHub: https://github.com/ugoi/Matcha

### ft_transcendence - Multiplayer Arcade Game
- Multiplayer online game combining classic arcade games (Pong, Breakout) with modern features
- Technologies: NestJS, React, Docker, PostgreSQL, WebSocket, TypeScript
- Features: Special abilities, power-ups, leveling system, real-time matches, ranking system
- GitHub: https://github.com/FVNRLS/ft_transcendence

### ft_irc - IRC Server
- Robust Internet Relay Chat server implementation in C++98
- Technologies: C++98, TCP/IP, Socket Programming, Non-blocking I/O
- Features: Multi-client support, channel management, private messaging, operator commands
- GitHub: https://github.com/Qfinel/42School_ft_irc

### Camagru - Photo Editing Platform
- Web-based photo editing platform combining webcam captures with superposable images
- Technologies: React, TypeScript, Java, PostgreSQL, WebRTC, Image Processing
- Features: User authentication, gallery management, real-time webcam preview, social features

### Swifty Companion - 42 Student Info App
- Mobile application retrieving and displaying 42 student information using 42 API
- Technologies: Swift, iOS, OAuth2, REST API
- Features: User profiles, skills display, project history, responsive layouts

### cub3D - RayCaster Game
- 3D ray-casting game inspired by Wolfenstein 3D
- Technologies: C, miniLibX, RayCasting, Graphics
- Features: Textured walls, smooth movement controls, custom map parser

### ft_hangouts - Contact Management App
- Mobile application for managing contacts and sending text messages
- Technologies: Android, iOS, SQLite, Mobile SDK
- Features: Persistent SQLite storage, bilingual support, conversation history
